snippet: “Hard Choices,” which recounts Hillary Rodham Clinton’s years as secretary of state as she emerges as a potential presidential candidate, is due out in June.
abstract: Simon & Schuster announces that Hillary Rodham Clinton's coming memoir about her tenure as Secretary of State will be titled Hard Choices.
lead_paragraph: “Hard Choices,” which recounts Hillary Rodham Clinton’s years as secretary of state as she emerges as a potential presidential candidate, is due out in June.

headline.main: Clinton Publisher Settles on Title for New Memoir
headline.print_headline: Choosing a Book Title to Fit Clinton’s Job
